# test filter

## set up

```{r setup}
library(sattagutils)
```
# load data

Load a sample data set: `Locations` and `Argos`. I want the secondary positions from `Argos`, but ultimately I'd like to model from the ellipse errors present in `Locations`.

```{r load-data}
datapath <- "data/ex1"

loc <- sattagutils::rcsv(file.path(datapath, "ex1-Locations.csv"))
arg <- sattagutils::rcsv(file.path(datapath, "ex1-Argos.csv"))
```

# combine loc and arg

```{r prep-data}
loc$date <- sattagutils::date2num(loc$Date, format = "%H:%M:%S %d-%b-%Y", tz = "UTC")
arg$date <- sattagutils::date2num(arg$Date, format = "%H:%M:%S %d-%b-%Y", tz = "UTC")


```
